reviewText: I like this young mans voice, but I thought this was a poor to average attempt to revive some timeless classics. Some of the arrangements were over the top, and I didn't hear the tone in is voice that I remembered on his previous tv appearances.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This DVD of Clay's Concert thrilled my daughter and me.  Not only can you hear his great voice, you get to see him sing.These are the same songs that are on his CD, TRIED AND TRUE, but seeing him sing them with his facial expressions adds a lot.I love ALL of the songs, especially BUILD ME UP BUTTERCUP, MOON RIVER, MISTY, SUSPICIOUS MINDS, IT'S IMPOSSIBLE, WHAT KIND OF FOOL AM I?,CRYING (WITH LINDA EDER), and especially the encore, UNCHAINED MELODY.The lighting on this DVD is interesting.  The Band and backup singers add to the fun.  Clay moves around the stage and gives us a few stories.  He surprises us with a song by Ruben Stoddard.If you couldn't get to Raleigh in March to see this concert, this is the next best thing.  It is surprising how different songs show different parts of Clay's talent.I recommennd that you buy this with the extras and the short CD so you can listen to Clay whereever you are.  Excellent DVD.  I hope he makes one of Broadway songs soon. If you want to get SOLTAIRE, buy Clay's Playlist.

reviewText: I first saw this on PBS and was taken by how many songs from my past he sang.  It made me feel very nastalgic.  Thank You..I love this DVD and so do my friends.

reviewText: Tried And True Live is a wonderful DVD. Clay Aiken shows why he is a star in every way.Singing the songs well he also knows how to move and sell them. You can feel the joy he has at performing in his home town. A particular favorite of mine is Suspicious Minds.

reviewText: A must have for Clay Aiken fans and those who are not soon will be!! What a great talent!He takes oldies and new songs and puts his own special flair to them. He really is a star!!! I watch and listen to it often!! Even people who are not fans really love the vidieo!

reviewText: I'm a Clay Aiken fan since he was a runner-up on American Idol back ib Season 2!  This was an excellent live concert with many of my favorites and some old classics and I thoroughly enjoyed every minute of it.  Thank you, Amazon, again--the only place I go to for videos, DVDs, and books--you can't beat their prices!
